title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Course Content Nature, function and types of intelligence; Emotion, intelligence and creativity; Growth and development of emotional intelligence; Theories and models of emotional intelligence: ability based model, personality based model, performance based model, mixed model; Culture, leadership and emotional intelligence, assessments and evaluation of EI, application of EI in work and personal life; Future directions of EI in research and deployment.
